name: Meet Me in the Parking Lot!
storyline:
The year is 2030 and you wake up in the trunk of a car only to get out and find the world had gone to full blown apocalypse.
You could try and fix the situation, but it'd be a lot easier to just find a bar and grab a drink!
Too bad some folks wanna start shit even as the world is ending!

Fight your way through 10 Levels of random bars and parking lots worth of assholes that can’t just let you chill. No kicks. No combos. Just good old fashioned, fist in your face mayhem.
summary: In Meet Me In The Parking Lot you have to fight your way through 10 Levels of random bars and parking lots worth of assholes that can’t just let you chill.
